gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 141, Thunder 138
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks snapped a 5-game win streak for the Thunder as they held on to win the game, 141-138. Jalen Johnson led the Hawks with a career-high 28 points, along with seven rebounds, three assists, and four steals as Trae Young added 24 points and 11 assists. It was Traes 22nd double-double of the year as seven Hawks players scored in double-digits (four with 20+). Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Thunder with 33 points, a season-high 13 rebounds, and eight assists as Jalen Williams totaled 21 points, six assists, and five steals. The Hawks move to 14-19 as the Thunder move to 23-10.
